member.name: T:OdarTec3Axes.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: Eine stark typisierte Ressourcenklasse zum Suchen von lokalisierten Zeichenfolgen usw.

member.name: P:OdarTec3Axes.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Gibt die zwischengespeicherte ResourceManager-Instanz zurück, die von dieser Klasse verwendet wird.

member.name: P:OdarTec3Axes.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Überschreibt die CurrentUICulture-Eigenschaft des aktuellen Threads für alle Ressourcenzuordnungen, die diese stark typisierte Ressourcenklasse verwenden.

member.name: P:OdarTec3Axes.My.Resources.Resources.SWXUiTreeView
member.summary: Sucht eine lokalisierte Ressource vom Typ System.Drawing.Bitmap.

member.name: T:OdarTec3Axes.SerialDevice
member.summary: Provides a wrapper for a SerialPort which automatically reads data from the port and processes it via assigned Func(Of Byte(), Integer, Integer) delegates. Also provides "Send" methods for writing character, byte, hex, and string data to the port.

member.name: P:OdarTec3Axes.SerialDevice.Connected
member.summary: Gets a value determining if the serial port is open.

member.name: P:OdarTec3Axes.SerialDevice.ComPort
member.summary: Gets or sets the COM Port name that the physical device is connected to, or virtual COM Port name created by the physical device.

member.name: P:OdarTec3Axes.SerialDevice.DtrEnable
member.summary: Gets or sets a value determining whether or not the serial port will use data-terminal-ready signals (default is False).

member.name: P:OdarTec3Axes.SerialDevice.Encoding
member.summary: Gets or sets the text encoding used to convert between character strings and byte data (default is ASCII).

member.name: P:OdarTec3Axes.SerialDevice.NewLine
member.summary: Gets or sets the string used to represent a line terminator (default CrLf).

member.name: P:OdarTec3Axes.SerialDevice.Baud
member.summary: Gets or sets a value specifying the baud rate to use.

member.name: P:OdarTec3Axes.SerialDevice.DataBits
member.summary: Gets or sets a value specifying the data bits to use.

member.name: P:OdarTec3Axes.SerialDevice.StopBits
member.summary: Gets or sets a value specifying the stop bits to use.

member.name: P:OdarTec3Axes.SerialDevice.Parity
member.summary: Gets or sets a value specifying the parity to use.

member.name: P:OdarTec3Axes.SerialDevice.FlowControl
member.summary: Gets or sets a value specifying the hardware handshaking to use.

member.name: P:OdarTec3Axes.SerialDevice.RtsEnable
member.summary: Gets or sets a value determining whether or not the serial port uses ready-to-send signals (default False).

member.name: P:OdarTec3Axes.SerialDevice.MessageMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the processing mode. In ByteMode, the CheckMessageComplete delegate will be invoked for every byte received. In BlockMode, available data will be read at once and sent to CheckMessageComplete in chunks, as available.

member.name: P:OdarTec3Axes.SerialDevice.CheckMessageComplete
member.summary: Gets or sets a delegate function which will be called to determine if a complete message has been queued. This function must return zero if the bytes received so far do not constitute a complete message, or a positive integer value representing the number of bytes which make up the complete message.
member.example:
The following example defines a simple check message delegate function and sets it to the CheckMessageComplete property.
mySerialDevice.CheckMessageComplete = AddressOf(DoCheckMessage)
Function DoCheckMessage(data As Byte(), count As Integer) As Integer '1) Determine if data contains complete message '2) Return number of bytes in message if complete, or return 0 if not complete End Function

member.name: P:OdarTec3Axes.SerialDevice.ProcessError
member.summary: An optional Action(Of PortState, SerialError) delegate to be invoked when a serial port error occurs. Only as reliable as the SerialPort.ErrorReceived event. See MSDN documentation for details.

member.name: P:OdarTec3Axes.SerialDevice.ProcessMessage
member.summary: A required Action(Of Byte(), Integer) delegate to be invoked when the CheckMessageComplete delegate call returns a positive value. This delegate method performs the actual work of processing the message data received from the serial device.

member.name: P:OdarTec3Axes.SerialDevice.ProcessPinChange
member.summary: An optional Action(Of PortState, SerialPinChange) delegate to be invokde when a serial pin change event occurs. See the MSDN documentation for SerialPort.PinChanged event for more information.

member.name: M:OdarTec3Axes.SerialDevice.ConfigurePort
member.summary: Configures the serial port with the default baud rate (9800), 8 data bits, no parity, one stop bit, and no flow control.

member.name: M:OdarTec3Axes.SerialDevice.#ctor(System.IO.Ports.SerialPort)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of SerialDevice using the specified existing SerialPort instance.

member.name: M:OdarTec3Axes.SerialDevice.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of SerialDevice with its own internal SerialPort.

member.name: M:OdarTec3Axes.SerialDevice.Connect
member.summary: Opens the SerialPort and connects to the physical device if the PortName, CheckMessageComplete delegate, and ProcessMessage delegate have all been specified.

member.name: M:OdarTec3Axes.SerialDevice.Disconnect
member.summary: Ends processing of the SerialDevice and closes the underlying serial port.

member.name: M:OdarTec3Axes.SerialDevice.SendChar(System.Char)
member.summary: Sends a single character to the serial port.

member.name: M:OdarTec3Axes.SerialDevice.SendData(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Sends a byte or series of bytes to the serial port.

member.name: M:OdarTec3Axes.SerialDevice.SendHex(System.String)
member.summary: Sends a byte or series of bytes in hexadecimal format to the serial port.

member.name: M:OdarTec3Axes.SerialDevice.SendString(System.String)
member.summary: Sends a string to the serial port using the current text encoding.

member.name: T:OdarTec3Axes.PortState
member.summary: Provides information about the state of a serial port.

member.name: T:OdarTec3Axes.CommonBaudRate
member.summary: Provides a list of common serial baud rates.

member.name: T:OdarTec3Axes.MessageProcessingMode
member.summary: Specifies the processing mode for messages.

member.name: F:OdarTec3Axes.MessageProcessingMode.ByteMode
member.summary: The CheckMessageComplete delegate will be invoked for every byte received.

member.name: F:OdarTec3Axes.MessageProcessingMode.BlockMode
member.summary: The CheckMessageComplete delegate will be invoked after all available data is read on each data received event.

member.name: T:OdarTec3Axes.UserControl1
member.summary: UserControl1

member.name: M:OdarTec3Axes.UserControl1.InitializeComponent
member.summary: InitializeComponent
